netlify-deployments.plugin.name: Netlify Deployments
home-page.header.title: Netlify Deployments
home-page.header.subtitle: View current and past deploys below and trigger a new deploy by clicking Deploy.
settings-page.header.title: Configuration
settings-page.header.subtitle: Configure your Netlify Deployments plugin
settings-page.build-hook.label: Build Hook
settings-page.build-hook.placeholder: You need to set `buildHook` in plugin config
settings-page.access-token.label: Access Token
settings-page.access-token.placeholder: You need to set `accessToken` in plugin config
settings-page.access-token.learn-more-in: Access tokens can be created and managed inside your
settings-page.site-id.label: Site ID
settings-page.site-id.placeholder: You need to set `siteId` in plugin config
settings-page.site-id.learn-more-text: Set the Site ID of your Netlify site found at Site settings > General to see only the deployments you need
deploy-button.label: Deploy
deploy-error-message.missing-config-obje: Unexpected config error: the config object is empty
deploy-error-message.missing-config-vari: Config error: You did not set the Netlify Build Hook. Go to
deployments-empty-state.missing-config-o: The config object is empty and this is unexpected
deployments-empty-state.missing-config-v: You did not set the Netlify Access Token. Go to
deployments-empty-state.missing-deployme: There isn't any deployment in your account
deployments-empty-state.error-deployment: There was an error while fetching the deployments. Please, retry.
deployments-empty-state.error-availabili: There was an error while fetching the features availability. Please, retry.
deployments-empty-state.error-config: There was an error while fetching the configurations. Please, retry.
